## Description {#details}

This file describes how to lower LLVM code to machine code.

This has two main components:


<ul>
<li>Which ValueTypes are natively supported by the target.</li>
<li>Which operations are supported for supported ValueTypes.</li>
<li>Cost thresholds for alternative implementations of certain operations.</li>
</ul>


In addition it has a few other components, like information about FP immediates.

<SectionDefinition>
